title: What should I do if my Android music player is not displaying songs from my SD card? - Quora

response.answer_text: You could force your Android system to rescan and reindex all the media on the SD card. One of the applications that helped me do this was: SD Card Rescan - Android Apps on Google Play. Definitely check it out! It will solve your problem!

I have various tablets and phones and for all but the Sony products I’ve been able to load music on an SD card Via PC only, then insert the card in the device and they would show in various players (as long as the card was previously formatted for Android). With Sony though, I had to format the card in the device (Xperia Phone) and then connect to PC via charging cable(make sure it’s a good cable, recent) and copy the files over the old fashioned way by dragging and dropping with the Windows File Explorer. Now all my audio is showing in the apps on the phone. It’s a pain and time consuming but it works.

I had aslo that problem..but now i solveld it.. First of all go to SD card Then go to where ur songs are saved.. After that change that File name..that file name should be “music”. I tried it..its works..i hope u should try it..all the best
